Package danogl.components

A few useful components that can be added to a GameObject
Author:
Dan Nirel
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component
    Represents a function that should be executed in a GameObject in each update
    Transition.Interpolator<T>
    Represents an interpolator, which receives an initial value, a final value, and a t parameter between 0 and 1, and returns the in-between value at t
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameObjectPhysics
    Encapsulates the physics-related attributes of a GameObject
    RendererComponent
    Encapsulates the rendering properties and abilities of a GameObject
    ScheduledTask
    A component for scheduling a task for execution at a later time
    Transform
    Encapsulates some properties of a GameObject that are related to its transform from object-space to world-space
    Transition<T>
    Transition a value over a range
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CoordinateSpace
    Enum for selecting the coordinate system of a GameObject
    Transition.TransitionType
    Type of transition
